node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `registry` ( `registry_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `question` text COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, `public` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `input_style` char(16) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`registry_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci
node.title: registry
